title: Openhub
subtitle: Software Engineering Intern | June 2024 - August 2024 @ Belgium
bulletPoints: Developed a full-stack app, used by the head engineer to manage a printer farm. Allowed up to 7 printers to be used at once, remotely.
Meant to be used by dozens of employees.
Leveraged React.js, Javascript, Node.js, Python, and Firebase and libraries and APIs like: Prusalink API, requests, and GoogleAuth.

title: Headstarter.ai
